rows.label: qst201501_msg0001
rows.name: Ugh... I'm in a tough spot...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0002
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, the other day,
my ship... it sank...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0004
rows.name:
All the crew were safe, but
the cargo is all at the
bottom of the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0005
rows.name: I was just wondering what to do now...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0006
rows.name: What a disaster.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0007
rows.name:
...Say, was that the ship
carrying the Gulan cargo?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0008
rows.name: A-A witch?!

rows.label: qst201501_msg0009
rows.name:
Someone said they saw a witch in the
distance when the ship sank... I never
thought she'd chase me all the way here...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0010
rows.name: D-Damn it...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0011
rows.name:
The plan doesn't matter anymore!
I have to get out of here!

rows.label: qst201501_msg0012
rows.name: H-Hey, wait...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0013
rows.name: ...And he's gone.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0014
rows.name: What was that all about?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0015
rows.name:
...Honestly, running away the
moment he saw my face. How rude.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0016
rows.name:
Azami... You seem to know about
that sailor and the sunken ship.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0017
rows.name:
Fufu... Of course. I was
assigned to surveil them.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0018
rows.name:
...Then do you also know the
circumstances under which it sank?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0019
rows.name:
Fufufu... After all, I was
the one who sank the ship...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0020
rows.name: You sank it?! ...Why would you do that?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0021
rows.name: What does it matter?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0022
rows.name:
There was a clearly suspicious
person on board, and the cargo
was questionable too.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0023
rows.name:
If I sank the ship, they couldn't do any
more harm, and my boring mission would
end. Two birds with one stone, right?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0024
rows.name: ...Even so, isn't this a bit excessive?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0025
rows.name: Because... I was lonely.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0026
rows.name:
Lonely? You sank a ship
for a reason like that?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0027
rows.name:
What do you mean, "a reason
like that"? I want to be with
my beloved Driver more.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0028
rows.name: But you just don't understand...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0029
rows.name:
Besides, you're the one who gave me
a boring surveillance mission...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0030
rows.name:
It's your fault for not
keeping me company...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0031
rows.name: I was so lonely...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0032
rows.name: Even so...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0033
rows.name:
Um... I think I can understand
how Azami feels...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0034
rows.name:
So, how about we all carry
out the mission together?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0035
rows.name:
What? My beloved Driver
will come with me?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0036
rows.name:
If so, I'll behave and carry
out the mission properly.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0037
rows.name: ...Meleph, what should we do?

rows.label: qst201501_msg0038
rows.name:
Right... This might be better
than her running wild.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0039
rows.name: Really?! Fufu... I'm so happy...

rows.label: qst201501_msg0040
rows.name:
Then if it's decided, let's
continue the surveillance
mission right away.

rows.label: qst201501_msg0041
rows.name: Let's head to the Great Blowhole...
